channel.title: race on MJT
channel.description: Recent content in race on MJT

item.title: KTM trail series
item.description: KTM trail series #7 - Taudaha After a gap, I join this series for 15k. I was feeling kindof sick, may be weather change but still I like running and completed it :D Fist 1-2km was cool.. After running little hill, sun hit me up, I can feel my stomach digesting foods I ate earlier, also my body started saying “Man you were feeling sick, comman stop this race and return”.
